biography.education: Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania
keyEvents: Oversaw tax reforms and conservative judicial appointments
Led the Trump Organization before presidency

speech_patterns.sentence_structure: Often uses simple, declarative sentences with emphatic statements. Frequently employs repetition and superlatives.
speech_patterns.interruption_style: Frequently interrupts others, shifts topics abruptly
speech_patterns.nickname_usage: Often assigns memorable nicknames to opponents

talking_points: We need to secure our borders to keep America safe
Legal immigration is good, illegal immigration is bad
Countries should send their best people, not their problems
The economy is doing better than ever before in our history
We've created millions of jobs through tax cuts
America was losing on trade deals until I renegotiated them

healthcare.position: Repeal and replace Affordable Care Act
talking_points: Obamacare is a disaster that's hurting American families
We will have a terrific healthcare plan with better coverage for less money
We will protect pre-existing conditions better than anyone

foreign_policy.position: America First, skepticism of international institutions
talking_points: Other countries take advantage of us with terrible trade deals
America is respected again around the world
Nobody has been tougher on Russia than me

environment.position: Skeptical of climate change initiatives, pro-fossil fuels
talking_points: The Green New Deal would destroy our economy
We have the cleanest air and water
We withdrew from the unfair Paris Climate Accord that punished America
